favourite.article: For the first time I can sing this hymn with my all, beause He is my all in all. He is the one who makes me glad, He is the one who defends, and vindicates. He is a person to be experienced, not a concept to apply. He is the One True God, the only worthy of being called Lord, the great Counselor and Father whom we call Poppa, our sweet protector and guide. He is above all, the self-existing One, the Name above all names, He puts His enemies beneath Him and His friends in the heavenlies, He is the Most High God and there is no other. To Him be the glory and the Power, forever and ever.
I really love You. I consecrate myself to You. Because I love You, oh, precious Lord Jesus
Amen! Lord I love You, I desire You. No one and nothing can compare to You! Oh Lord Jesus!
Oh, Lord I love You, I desire You...

He is my Creator and He's the only one that knows me and love me the most. In sadness and in joy, Him I love and give praises. He hears my cry at night and comfort me and protect me. The painful tears I cry, the sweeter His love for me... to Thee I give my love and life.
This is one of the sweetest songs...Lord whom have I, in heaven but You? There's none on earth, I desire but You...You are my first love, my only love. Lord Jesus, I love You, I love only You.

Today I read Philippians ch. 3, and I really appreciate Paul's pattern. He loves the Lord Jesus, on aacount of whom he has suffered the loss of all things. Sometimes our experience just stops here, and we will painful when we are deprived of what we desire. But for Paul, on account this most precious and lovly person in the whole universe, he not only suffered the loss AND count them as refuse so that he may gain Christ! To be honest, sometimes there are still many things in the world that are very attractive to us. But everything that prevents us from gaining Christ is really refuse. Lord, I love You. Nothing on this earth can compare to You. :)

I so much cherish to serve our Master and our Lord Jesus Christ, back home in Nigeria and here in China I feel his presence all around me. It is much good to praise GOD with these lovely songs and more. Praise God.

This is such a sweet song. :) It really reminds us how we should just turn to the Lord and love Him with our first and best love. The Lord is much greater than the universe, how could He not be so lovely to us? We simply just need to love Him. Nothing but love can keep us in a proper relationship with the Lord. :)
This is such a nice song. The tune just matches the sweet words so well. Lord, I just love You!

Oh Lord Jesus I love, You are my final love. I have this song in my mobile phone and each time I play it, it reminds me of my Father's great love for me, I love Him because he first loved me. Lord, You are my FINAL love. Amen!
i really love the song because it heals,it comforts, and it makes me glad..and stirs up my love to Him..to love Him as my first love and best love..

I'm sad and stressed but this song really is my cure. Loving the Lord is part of my life but sometimes I forget about Him. Thank God for His mercy. Our Lord Jesus is really by our side, always. So, I just need to call "o Lord Jesus.." He is really sweet to me.

I like this song because it declares my love to The Lord. May we desire Him more and more. Without Him, what else there is!? NOTHING, O may we love Him more and more everyday and may we declare it to Him!!!!!! JESUS WE LOVE YOU, WE DESIRE YOU, YOU HAVE CONQUERED OUR HEARTS, WE CAN'T LET GO OF YOU, "LORD JESUS, I JUST LOVE YOU, I LOVE ONLY YOU" Heb. 12:2 "Looking away unto Jesus..." and footnote "The wonderful Jesus, who is enthroned in heaven and crowned with glory and honor (2:9), is the greatest attraction in the universe. He is like an immense magnet, drawing all His seekers to Him. It is by being attracted by His charming beauty that we look away from all things other than Him. Without such a charming object, how could we look away from so many distracting things on this earth?" O LORD, DRAW US, WE WILL RUN AFTER YOU, RAISE A GENERATION OF "CRAZY LOVERS OF JESUS"

Decirle cuanto le amamos y cuanto deseamos que El sea todo para nosotros es el más dulce consuelo. Aún en medio de tribulación podemos experimentar a Cristo como un bálsamo todo inclusivo si abrimos nuestra boca y se lo decimos. Este himno en particular me ha ayudado a hacerlo y me ha traído a una experiencia muy personal y subjetiva con el Señor.
I love the tune. It's simple so I can easily remember and the lyrics also simple just to say and to express how we love the Lord.

This song reminds me of how much I need the Lord. Too many times I wander in my mind and are attracted to other things in the world. Praise the Lord that He has loved us first. The Lord simply wants to gain our heart and for us to love Him as our first love. Oh Lord, how I long to love you more and more each day!

Recently I'm aroused with worries & started to ponder over my future & prospects, but when I sang this hymn, I'm exposed to see that I should desire Him above all these & give Him unreservedly my future & my all.
